planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward closest goal.
If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
Do not stop on Maelstrom.
c. Buy a ship card. If unable, buy a gear card.
action: If at cargo destination, deliver it.
If all job slots full, buy cargo card. Otherwise,buy a job card. Then, place a goal token on card's destination.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Gain credits 1 000 for each different skill Aphra and her crew have.
special: Discard top cards from bounty and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.
